days.text: Cold and dry. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Light rain at first. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Very dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Fine. Force 2 to 3 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Fine. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
